properties.title: Parc de la Ciutadella
properties.description: A large park in Barcelona, featuring a zoo, a lake, museums, and the iconic Cascada Monumental fountain.

properties.title: Palau de la Música Catalana
properties.description: A concert hall known for its stunning modernist architecture and cultural performances.

properties.title: El Xampanyet
properties.description: A traditional cava bar offering tapas and an authentic Barcelona experience.

properties.title: Park Güell
properties.description: A colorful park designed by Antoni Gaudí, featuring unique architectural elements and scenic views of Barcelona.

properties.title: Bodega Biarritz 1881
properties.description: A cozy bar offering delicious tapas and drinks in the heart of the Gothic Quarter.

properties.title: Sagrada Família
properties.description: The iconic basilica designed by Antoni Gaudí, a must-visit cultural and architectural landmark.

properties.title: Montjuïc Park
properties.description: A sprawling park with gardens, museums, and a castle, offering panoramic views of the city.

properties.title: La Rambla
properties.description: A vibrant pedestrian street with shops, cafes, and street performers.

properties.title: Paradiso
properties.description: A world-class cocktail bar with a hidden entrance and creative drinks.

properties.title: Casa Batlló
properties.description: A masterpiece of modernist architecture designed by Antoni Gaudí.
